About


Welcome to the VE3MAL static website.

Also, see QRZ, or find me on the irc.geekshed.net IRC Network in #Redditnet. Yes, IRC still exists, and it's still better than everything else. /me buries head in sand. You can use an in-browser chat, but I recommend the venerable weechat for the rich terminal-based experience. TheLounge is a nice self-hosted in-browser client.


Sign the ! (Here, or directly on the Github Issue)
